Build-Depends: audacious-dev, cmake, debhelper-compat (= 13), gawk, gperf, lcov, libaudclient-dev, libcairo2-dev, libcurl4-gnutls-dev | libcurl4-dev, libdbus-glib-1-dev, libdevstat-dev [kfreebsd-any], libglib2.0-dev, libical-dev, libimlib2-dev, libircclient-dev, libiw-dev [linux-any], libkvm-dev [kfreebsd-any], liblua5.3-dev, libncurses-dev, libpango1.0-dev, libpulse-dev, librsvg2-dev (>= 2.52), libsystemd-dev [linux-any], libtool, libwayland-dev, libx11-dev, libxdamage-dev, libxext-dev, libxft-dev, libxml2-dev, libxnvctrl-dev [i386 amd64] | nvidia-settings [i386 amd64], pandoc, pkgconf, python3-jinja2, python3-yaml, wayland-protocols
Package-List: conky-all deb utils optional arch=any conky-cli deb utils optional arch=any conky-std deb utils optional arch=any
